brainly_data.question: Which of these leaders forced General Lee to surrender for the Confederate Army, ending the Civil War?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Which of these leaders forced General Lee to surrender for the Confederate Army, ending the Civil War?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: General Ulysses S. Grant was the leader of the Union forces when Lee surrendered, but the Union went through many leaders.

top_answer.question: Which of these leaders forced General Lee to surrender for the Confederate Army, ending the Civil War?
top_answer.subject: History
top_answer.text: General Ulysses S. Grant was the leader of the Union forces when Lee surrendered, but the Union went through many leaders.
